mapper.select: SELECT ID, COMPANY_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_INFO, POSITION_DUE_DATE, POSITION_OPEN_DATE, POSITION_STATUS, MID_CATEGORY_ID FROM TBL_POSITION

SELECT P.ID, P.COMPANY_ID,P.POSITION_NAME,P.POSITION_INFO, P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,P.MID_CATEGORY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_COMPANY C JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID
